body:
Heyo!!!So, I am looking for Staff members on my server, Principally Developers and Map Makers, But Mods are looked for to! I am not going to post the Ip, Because that is not allowed, But I would like to say that Feel free to apply. We are looking for:


3 Moderators:
Appliance for mod is simple:
IGN:
Skype name(Will be needed to give you the Teamspeak ip)

As many Map Makers as possible:
Appliance for MP is easy as well:
IGN:
Skype name(Needed to give you the teamspeak ip)

As many developers as possible: Now, Developers can be people that suggest plugins,Create or Edit plugins.

title: Looking for Staff members on my server.

replies.body: E. 5: Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising.

replies.body:
Sorry, but threads like these are not allowed on the forums.

If you would like to recruit people for your server, I would suggest making a thread on Reddit or minecraftservers.org.
